authenticationOther.title: Profile Verification
authenticationOther.msg1: Please make sure that your real identity is used. We will protect your personal information.
authenticationOther.msg2: Please make sure that the photo is complete and clearly visible, in JPG format. Less than 5M.
authenticationOther.msg3: Please make sure that the photo is complete and clearly visible, in JPG format. ID card must be in the valid period.
authenticationOther.msg4: Once your profile has been submitted,the system will verify it within ** hours.There will be a delay for holidays and festivals.Please be patient to wait for the verification results.
